enhanced_description: Boat Noodles is a beloved soul-warming soup from central Thailand that with a pleasant kick of heat. Rich pork or beef noodle soup traditionally served in small portions. This medium recipe takes about 30 minutes to prepare and represents the authentic flavors of Central Thai cuisine balances sweet, sour, salty and spicy flavors perfectly. The combination of rice noodles, pork or beef, dark soy sauce creates a harmonious blend that has made this dish a favorite among locals and visitors alike. Perfect for those seeking affordable authentic Thai cuisine.
